events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your submission shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further evaluation by the relevant hiring managers.
A recruiter experienced in software engineering positions has been assigned to your application to guide you through the next steps.
We conducted an initial phone screening to discuss your background and relevant software engineering experience.
Thank you for your prompt and detailed responses during the initial screening, which really helped us understand your skills.
Your technical interview with our senior engineers has been scheduled for May 7th at 10:00 AM UTC via video call.
You completed the technical interview which included coding challenges and systems design questions, demonstrating strong engineering skills.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2:00 PM UTC to further discuss your fit with company culture and benefits.
You successfully completed the HR interview, expressing enthusiasm about the role and aligning well with company values.
We are excited to extend you an official offer for the Software Engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits.
You have accepted the job offer, and we are thrilled to have you join our engineering team starting next month.
Your onboarding process has officially started with orientation sessions and IT setup planned for a smooth integration.
The hiring process is now closed, and you are officially onboarded as a Software Engineer in our company. Welcome aboard!
